author: Karel Vik
description:
Borderlands 4 – Everything You Need to Know

Borderlands 4 is the next chapter in Gearbox’s legendary looter-shooter franchise, taking the mayhem, humor, and over-the-top gunplay to an entirely new level. This time, you’re thrown into a fresh war across multiple planets, where new Vaults hide ancient alien tech, and factions fight to control them. The signature cel-shaded style is back, but now with even richer worlds, deeper skill trees, and an endgame built for long-term replayability.

https://www.youtube.com/embed/NtSRtcXcCnk

title: Borderlands 4
